snippet.title: Pixel Poops Number Two Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Pixel Poops: Number Two is the NES sequel to the yyrGames classic Pixel Poops about "heroes" with super-human bowels and their supposed hatred of health-conscious joggers. It features two player simultaneous co-op and an energetic soundtrack featuring original tracks by Cosmicgem.

1/1/21: Now you too can check out a 5 level exclusive demo of Pixel Poops: Number Two for the NES. Now with 100% rainbow magic! DOWNLOAD NOW: https://techmastergames.itch.io/pixel-poops-number-two-new-years-special-preview

Pixel Poops: Number Two is available now on Itch: https://techmastergames.itch.io/pixel-poops-number-two-nes and Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1498530/Pixel_Poops__Pixel_Poops_Number_Two_for_NES/
